vote.text: Amendment SA 3701 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3701 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Bingaman. (consideration: CR S9588-9592; text: CR S9590) Making available funds for UNFPA.
